message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be really valuable for you and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have. How does $115 sound to start?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would $100 be possible for you?
I understand your budget concerns, Bob, but $100 is just too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $107.50?
I see, $107.50 is still out of my range. Can we try $105?
